reasoning: Vanilla JS with Vite for dev server and Tailwind support if desired, minimal build overhead
features: Configure work schedule (days of week, start/end times)
Large, readable display optimized for quick glances
Two states: NO WORK TODAY (festive) vs time remaining countdown

technicalApproach.entry: index.html with linked main.js and style.css
technicalApproach.state: localStorage for schedule, vanilla JS Date API for calculations
technicalApproach.styling: Tailwind or plain CSS, optimized for readability at distance
technicalApproach.updates: setInterval updating DOM directly, recalculate every minute

implementation.config: Simple form, toggle visibility with CSS class or hidden attribute
implementation.calculation: Check if today is work day, calculate hours/minutes to end time
implementation.display: Single main element, swap text content based on work status
